title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1727-6.1 - Special services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1727-6.1 - Special services

State Regulations
A housing company may furnish tenants or cooperators
with special services not provided for in the lease, such as bus, laundry, television antenna or other services, but only upon such terms as the division
may approve in writing. The approval of the division will be given only upon
the express condition that such services, and all facilities used in connection
therewith, will be made available to all tenants on equal terms and shall be
self-sustaining. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1727-6.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
